Section 1 Purpose
1.1 Confidentiality. Each party shall keep Confidential Information strictly confidential.

Section 2 Term
2.1 Termination. Either party may terminate for material breach with thirty days notice.

Section 3 Liability
3.1 Limitation of Liability. Neither party shall be liable for indirect damages.

"Confidential Information" means non-public information disclosed by either party.
